articles.title: F1 will STOP drivers taking the knee at the front of the grid despite Lewis Hamilton's views - Daily Mail
articles.description: Lewis Hamilton - and a number of his fellow drivers - have knelt ahead of every race for the past two seasons in a show of solidarity against racism. But the gesture won't happen in the new season.
